products.title: Sio Charcoal Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Delicate yet dark and sophisticated, the sio charcoal roller blind will make a decidedly glamorous addition to your space. Golden stems gracefully snake across a brooding charcoal grey backdrop, giving length and flow to the print and an alluring exotic vibe. Expertly printed on durable dimout fabric, this roller blind will work well in a room with dark, rich colours, velvet fabrics and gold or copper accents.
